# Email Update Template

## Format for Internal Team Updates

## Template

```
Subject: [Type]: [Brief Description] — [Date]

Hi Team,

[Opening sentence — context and purpose]

## What Happened

[Brief summary of the event/update]

## Key Details

| Item | Detail |
|------|--------|
| [Item 1] | [Detail] |
| [Item 2] | [Detail] |
| [Item 3] | [Detail] |

## Impact

[Who/what is affected and how]

## Next Steps

1. [Action item 1 — Owner]
2. [Action item 2 — Owner]
3. [Action item 3 — Owner]

## Questions?

Reply to this email or reach out in Slack.

— [Name]
```

## Subject Line Formats

| Type | Format | Example |
|------|--------|---------|
| Launch | "Launch: [Feature] — [Date]" | "Launch: New Handbook UI — Jan 15" |
| Update | "Update: [Topic] — [Date]" | "Update: Pricing Changes — Jan 15" |
| Alert | "Alert: [Issue] — [Date]" | "Alert: API Downtime — Jan 15" |
| Reminder | "Reminder: [Action] — [Date]" | "Reminder: Key Rotation — Jan 15" |

## Types of Updates

### Product Launch

```
Subject: Launch: [Feature Name] — [Date]

Hi Team,

[Feature] is now live. Here's what you need to know.

## What Shipped

[Brief description]

## Key Features

- [Feature 1]
- [Feature 2]
- [Feature 3]

## Customer Impact

[How this helps customers]

## Next Steps

1. Update documentation — [Owner]
2. Announce to customers — [Owner]
3. Monitor for issues — [Owner]

— [Name]
```

### Incident Report

```
Subject: Incident Report: [Brief Description] — [Date]

Hi Team,

We experienced an incident with [system]. Here's what happened and what we're doing about it.

## Summary

| Item | Detail |
|------|--------|
| Duration | [Start] to [End] |
| Severity | [Low/Medium/High/Critical] |
| Affected | [Systems/users] |

## Root Cause

[What caused the incident]

## Resolution

[How we fixed it]

## Prevention

[Steps to prevent recurrence]

— [Name]
```

### Weekly Update

```
Subject: Weekly Update: [Week of Date]

Hi Team,

Here's what happened this week and what's coming next.

## This Week

- [Accomplishment 1]
- [Accomplishment 2]
- [Accomplishment 3]

## Metrics

| Metric | Value | Change |
|--------|-------|--------|
| [Metric 1] | [Value] | [Change] |
| [Metric 2] | [Value] | [Change] |

## Next Week

- [Priority 1]
- [Priority 2]
- [Priority 3]

— [Name]
```

## Tone Guidelines

- Direct and concise
- No jargon
- British English
- Professional but approachable
- Clear action items with owners

## Checklist

- [ ] Subject line follows format
- [ ] Opening sentence provides context
- [ ] Key details in table format
- [ ] Impact clearly stated
- [ ] Action items have owners
- [ ] Contact info for questions
- [ ] Proofread for typos
